EmailTemplate.name: INDIGO Template C2 - Short-Term Unskilled Application Received
EmailTemplate.subject: *Thank you for registering*
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for registering to volunteer through indiGO Volunteers, working in partnership with Help Refugees to coordinate and connect projects that need volunteers, with people like you wanting to help.
Unfortunately due to your availability being less than 14 days, we are unable to place you with projects in Greece, Serbia or Bosnia at this time. However there may be opportunities to volunteer with Help Refugees in Calais, France.
If you would like to find out more about volunteering with Help Refugees in Calais, France - simply reply to this email. We look forward to your confirmation email,
Peace and Love
indiGO Volunteers Coordination - Greece

NOTE:You have agreed to the following Liability Waiver Declaration. Whilst we will endeavour to ensure the sites adhere to relevant health and safety standards, all volunteers recognise that they are classed as independent volunteers and Help Refugees and indiGO are not liable for any incidents that may occur whilst active within our operations.We will act as a coordination between various actors operating in the military camps and cities, as such we may signpost volunteers or assign them roles within other organisations, as requested by those organisations. Once a volunteer undertakes to work in such a situation they agree to abide to any conduct or agreements provided by that organisation and are the sole responsibility of that organisation once working with them.
You have agreed to the above conditions and recognise that whilst you may work alongside the Help Refugees operations, you remain an independent volunteer and as such are responsible for your own welfare and safety at all times.
